description: a(1) = 1, a(2) = 3; for n>2, a(n) = least value > a(n-1) such that pairwise differences are unique.
comments: A variation on A005282 (Mian-Chowla, where sums of pairs of elements are unique).
crossrefs: Cf. A005282, A080201 (for differences that do not occur).
author: Gerald A. Mischke (Gerald.Mischke(AT)mutualofomaha.com), Dec 09 1999
